solution_line_template: The second cooler is {first_cooler_capacity}*{second_cooler_bigger_percent}=<<{first_cooler_capacity}*{second_cooler_bigger_percent}={second_cooler_increase}>>{second_cooler_increase} liters bigger than the first

So the total water they can hold is {first_cooler_capacity}+{second_cooler_capacity}+{third_cooler_capacity}=<<{first_cooler_capacity}+{second_cooler_capacity}+{third_cooler_capacity}={total_capacity}>>{total_capacity} liters
